author: Special Correspondent
text:
To beat the stress in the present day and to overcome discontentment prevailing in spite of all material acquisitions, the Heartfulness Institute, a part of Sahaj Marg Spiritual Foundation of Shri Ram Chandra Mission offered free meditation to the public.

According to a press release, the mission offered the humanity, a simple and effective set of practices for relaxation, meditation, purifying and simplifying inner strength and attitudes, which would help build a sense of fulfilment and overall growth.

Around 200 schools and colleges, companies including hospitals, commercial establishments, Collectorate and SHG institutions in many southern districts benefitted from the meditation programme so far. The Institute has put up a stall at the Ideal Home Expo in Tamukkum Grounds, which was inaugurated by Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao, volunteers of the Sahaj Marg said and for more details, public can contact 9443111500.
title: Free meditation
